changeSet.sql: create table bck_access_point as (select * from access_point ap);

changeSet.author: panovav
changeSet.sql:
-- 1st remove at last position comma update access_point set address = subq.adr_sb from (select ap.id, REGEXP_REPLACE(ap.address, '(,)$', '') as adr_sb from access_point ap) subq where access_point.id = subq.id;
-- 2nd update addresses update access_point set address = subq.adr_sb from ( select ap.id, REGEXP_REPLACE(ap.address, '.*, (.*),(.*)$', '\1, \2') as adr_sb from access_point ap ) subq where access_point.id = subq.id;
